business_account_id.description: The unique identifier of the Instagram business account associated with the media.

page_id.description: The unique identifier of the Instagram page where the media is posted.

id.description: The unique identifier of the media.

media_timestamp.description: The date and time when the media item was created.

ig_reels_avg_watch_time.description: The average watch time of Instagram Reels videos in seconds

ig_reels_video_view_total_time.description: The total watch time of Instagram Reels videos in seconds.

reach.description: The number of unique users who have seen the media.

saved.description: The number of times users have saved the media.

comments.description: The number of comments received on the media.

likes.description: The number of likes received on the media.

shares.description: The number of times the media has been shared.

total_interactions.description: The total number of interactions (likes, comments, shares) on the media.

follows.description: The number of accounts that started to follow the profile.

profile_visits.description: The number of times the profile has been visited.
